task.summary: Creating POST migration, model and controller.
Using Factories tu use dummy values for users and posts.
Showing posts data into the views: index and show post.
Creating routes::resource for posts and admin controller.
Using PostPolicy into the controller and views.
Using pagination in posts index view.
Creating Roles and Permissions tables and relations with users. Using the roles and permissions to validate users authorization.
Adding username, surname and avatar field into users table and model.
Creating user CRUD in admin dashboard.
Creating RoleMiddleware and UerPolicy for Admin and model owner same access.
